newsitem.title: FRANCE: Yasser Arafat arrives in Algiers.
newsitem.headline: Yasser Arafat arrives in Algiers.

text.p: Palestinian President Yasser Arafat arrived in Algiers on Wednesday for a brief visit to the North African country, the Algerian official news agency APS said.
Arafat was greeted by Foreign Minister Ahmed Attaf and Abdelkader Bensalah, speaker of the government-appointed Transitional National Council, a quasi-parliament.
The Palestinian leader is expected to hold talks with Algeria's President Liamine Zeroual to brief him on the stalled peace process with the right-wing Israeli government.
